\w O|strong="H4100"\w* expectation \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Saviour thereof \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*: \w why|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wayfaring man \w turning|strong="H5186"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* lodge?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wandering \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*? \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, art \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, forsake \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.
